txt.en: 'Our squads descend upon the Free Peoples endlessly, but if we don't keep close watch of our prizes, they'll soon slip away. We need scouts to report on our efforts at Tirith Rhaw and the mines at Isendeep. Do this and place yourself on the path to glory.'
'Ha, we'll have the enemy on the run soon enough!'
As the offensives to the east escalate, more scouts are needed to keep the Uruk-commanders informed.
Tirith Rhaw lies to the south-east of Gramsfoot and the Isendeep lies to the east.\n\nForzunk instructed you to scout the Isendeep and Tirith Rhaw.
Forzunk is at Gramsfoot.\n\nYou should report to Forzunk at once.
